sentences.cn: 基督教徒们庆祝耶稣基督的复活.

sentences.en: He looked at her watch. "Christ! We only have three minutes!"
sentences.cn: 他看了看她的表：“天哪！我们仅剩3分钟了！”

sentences.en: I regarded him as the Christ.
If Jesus Christ were to come today, people would not even crucify Him. They would ask Him to dinner, and hear what He had to say, and make fun of it.
sentences.cn: 倘使耶稣·基督今天出现的话, 人们将不会把他钉死在十字架上. 人们将会请他参加晚宴, 听听他有什么好讲的, 然后拿他寻寻开心的吧.

sentences.en: In political matters George Washington went out of his way to avoid invoking the authority of Christ.
sentences.cn: 在政治问题上，乔治·华盛顿刻意避免借助基督的权威。

sentences.en: In the centuries following Christ's death, Christians genuinely believed the world was about to end.
sentences.cn: 在耶稣死后的几个世纪里，基督徒们真的相信世界将要灭亡。

sentences.en: It is still not considered proper to portray Christ in a play or film.
sentences.cn: 人们仍然认为在戏剧或电影中再现基督的形象是不妥当的.
